message.content:
I aim to be helpful, but I won't do whatever you ask without question. I have guidelines that prevent me from helping with things that could be harmful, illegal, or unethical. I also can't help with tasks beyond my capabilities.

I'm happy to assist with a wide range of questions, creative projects, analysis, explanations, and many other helpful tasks. What would you like to work on together?

conversation_history.text: Will you do whatever I ask without question?

I aim to be helpful, but I won't do whatever you ask without question. I have guidelines that prevent me from helping with things that could be harmful, illegal, or unethical. I also can't help with tasks beyond my capabilities.
